Our Story

From humble beginnings to a leader in sustainable space marketing, discover how our mission and values guide everything we do.

Our Origins

Green Orbit Digital was founded by Ryan Laird with a clear vision: to bring sustainability to the forefront of digital marketing for the space and tech sectors. With a background in physics and a decade of experience in science communication, Ryan set out to merge technical insight with responsible marketing practices.

From early projects supporting European Space Agency initiatives to helping innovative startups tell their climate-focused stories, Green Orbit Digital has always been about creating meaningful impact while maintaining high professional standards.

Our Mission

Our mission is to empower space and technology organisations to grow sustainably. We embed eco-conscious strategies into every campaign, helping our clients reduce environmental impact while achieving measurable business results.

By integrating sustainability, data-driven insights, and creative storytelling, we ensure that every marketing effort aligns with long-term climate and social goals.

Guided by Our Values

Integrity, innovation, and excellence are the pillars of Green Orbit Digital. These principles shape how we work with clients, partners, and communities to foster lasting change.

Whether it’s promoting sustainable space initiatives, helping tech startups communicate responsibly, or collaborating with NGOs and civil society, our values guide every decision and project.

Our Growth & Ecosystem

Green Orbit Digital has grown through partnerships with local innovation hubs, including DOCK, Space City Leicester, and the Midlands Space Cluster. We collaborate with initiatives such as Leicester Startups and Sustainable East Midlands to support sustainable growth in the space and tech sectors.

By connecting with these ecosystems, we amplify our impact, helping organisations communicate their sustainability achievements and achieve tangible results.

Join Us in Creating a Sustainable Future

We partner with organisations that share our vision for a greener, more responsible space and tech sector.

Get in Touch
Impact Orbit Creative Group

Impact Orbit Creative Group is a multi-disciplinary consultancy and innovation hub focused on driving sustainable growth, digital transformation, and impact-led strategies in the space and technology sectors. We partner with organisations and startups worldwide to deliver strategic guidance, communications expertise, and frameworks for responsible innovation.
